title: ARURF sucks.
body:
Like, why even bother with it.

You get a good champ you like and someone dodges. The mode is less determined by skill and thought and more on RNG. There are no bans. I have played three games and Shaco has been in all three. Like, we see the same champs for some reason that it may as well just be normal URF.

So bland.

replies.body: I know its not related to this topic but anybody know if ARURF gonna be permanent. I read somewhere on the website saying the game mode suppose to be gone on the 14th of Feb

> [{quoted}](name=SOOM,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pd7nEfVg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-20T21:01:54.993+0000)
>
> don’t play it then

The argument is sound except for the fact that URF is actually a game mode that people enjoy. When it comes around, which is usually once per year, most people dive on it with abandon. It is a kick in the face when Riot know almost no one likes ARURF. People play it, yes, but no one enjoys it. Everyone tilts insanely quickly in it. People get sick of it after a few games because it is always the same thing with no way to get rid of it.

It also hardly helps that it is the same champions in each game. Do you know how unfun it is to be a melee champ that has nothing to actually contribute while you are versing a Lux, Morg, Leona, Amumu, and Ahri?

Arurf has like, 20 champs top and you see nothing else
It's not diverse it is BORING it's all on RNG since you can't pick or even ban anything.

We can't go for the champs we love or our mains if you get a lucky op champ then you are bored just one shotting ppl and if you are unlucky just ff...
There is no skill needed, no games are close you don't even team fight it's just laning phase the whole game
Those who enjoy this mode just joined LoL recently and know nothing of the potential it actually holds, they can't understand how bad this one right there is

ARUF should never come back it makes ppl sick of league even more, just bring back the real OG
Ultra Rapid Fire
